charges.charge_disposition: Dft is committed to BOP for term of 48 mos as to each of Cts 1 and 3 to run concurrently, and concurrent with Jackson County Missouri, Circuit Court Case No. 1316-CR04052; followed by Supervised Release term of 3 yrs as to each of Cts 1 and 3 to run concurrently. Standard/Special Conditions imposed. Costs/fines-Waived. MPA-$200.00. Court recommends that dft be designated to the medical facility in Springfield, MO for medical screening and potential treatment. Dft advised of right to appeal. Dft remanded to custody of USM.
